lines.value: dare to be stupid is the third studio album by weird al yankovic released on june 18 1985
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album was one of many produced by former the mccoys guitarist rick derringer
lines.name: English

lines.value: recorded between august 1984 and march 1985 the album was yankovic's first studio album released following the success of 1984's in 3-d which included the top 40 single eat it
lines.name: English

lines.value: the music on dare to be stupid is built around parodies and pastiches of pop and rock music of the mid 1980s featuring jabs at madonna cyndi lauper huey lewis and the news and the kinks
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album also features many style parodies or musical imitations that come close to but do not copy existing artists
lines.name: English

lines.value: these style parodies include imitations of specific artists like devo and elvis as well as imitations of various musical genres like doo wop sci fi soundtracks and music from the 1920s and 1930s
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite the mixed reception dare to be stupid sold well and peaked at number fifty on the billboard 200
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album also produced one of yankovic's more famous singles like a surgeon a parody of madonna's like a virgin which peaked at number forty seven on the billboard hot 100
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album was yankovic's second gold record and went on to be certified platinum for sales of over one million copies in the united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album was nominated for a grammy award for best comedy recording in 1986
lines.name: English

lines.value: in january 1985 yankovic entered the recording studio to begin the sessions to his in 3-d follow up album
lines.name: English

lines.value: to produce the album yankovic brought in former the mccoys guitarist rick derringer who also produced yankovic's previous albums
lines.name: English

lines.value: backing yankovic were jon bermuda schwartz on drums steve jay on bass and jim west on guitar
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first session yielded four originals dare to be stupid cable tv slime creatures from outer space and one more minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: the band also recorded a cover tune of the theme from george of the jungle
lines.name: English

lines.value: the following month yankovic began recording the four parodies and polka medley that would appear on the album yoda like a surgeon i want a new duck girls just want to have lunch and hooked on polkas
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is the life had already been recorded and released as a single in november 1984
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song describes the narrator's overly lavish lifestyle and had originally been commissioned for the gangster spoof movie johnny dangerously
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album's title track dare to be stupid is an ode to living life stupidly
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to the liner notes of the ultimate video collection the song represents al's motto in life
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song is a style parody of the band devo
lines.name: English

lines.value: devo's reaction was very positive
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic said right after i finished dare to be stupid i went over to mark mothersbaugh's house and played it for him
lines.name: English

lines.value: he seemed to enjoy it a lot the song was later released on the soundtrack to the 1986 film the transformers the movie
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic later mused that more people were introduced to dare to be stupid the song through the transformers movie than through the actual dare to be stupid album itself
lines.name: English

lines.value: one more minute about an ex girlfriend was written in the style of an elvis presley like doo wop
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to the liner notes of permanent record yankovic was preparing to write songs for dare to be stupid when his then girlfriend broke up with him
lines.name: English

lines.value: in order to mentally deal with the heartbreak yankovic decided to write a humorous song to express his anger eventually into one more minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic tears up her picture in the video
lines.name: English

lines.value: slime creatures from outer space features prominent usage of a theremin courtesy of steve jay in order to emulate the sound of cheesy 50s sci fi soundtracks
lines.name: English

lines.value: on february 21 1985 yankovic began recording the parodies for dare to be stupid
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first parody recorded for the album was yoda
lines.name: English

lines.value: yoda was originally written by yankovic during the initial run of the 1980 american film the empire strikes back
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the success of the movie yankovic toyed with the idea of writing a song based on the break out character but was unable to find a suitable song to use as the base
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic remembers i was still in college at the time and a friend of mine named mike suggested that i do the song to the tune of lola which i couldn't believe that i hadn't thought of myself since i was such a huge kinks fan yankovic wrote and recorded a version of the song using only an accordion on a four track cassette portastudio
lines.name: English

lines.value: this version of yoda was a hit on the dr demento show and even managed to hit and hold onto number one on the funny five countdown for several weeks
lines.name: English

lines.value: this early demo was later released on the sixth volume of dr demento's basement tapes
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the large success of the demo version yankovic wanted to put the song on one of his albums
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the immensely complex process of getting permission from george lucas and the publishers of the kinks lola delayed the release of the song for about five years
lines.name: English

lines.value: eventually after lucas gave yankovic permission the song's publishers turned al down
lines.name: English

lines.value: several versions of why the parody was turned down exist
lines.name: English

lines.value: in a 1985 interview with spin yankovic explained that we approached ray davies [the song's composer] we've been approaching him every year and a half two years before each album comes out and he's always been a little skeptical a little afraid because lola was a very personal song for him
lines.name: English

lines.value: then just out of the blue he decided this time to let us do it however the liner notes to the permanent record present a different story
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to the album's notes the song may have remained unreleased for some time had it not been for a chance encounter yankovic had with the song's original songwriter ray davies
lines.name: English

lines.value: when yankovic asked why he hadn't given him permission davies remarked that he had never been asked
lines.name: English

lines.value: davies immediately gave yankovic permission to record the song and the song was later released on dare to be stupid
lines.name: English

lines.value: the day after recording yoda yankovic started recording like a surgeon the lead single for the album
lines.name: English

lines.value: although yankovic normally refuses to use parody ideas from other people madonna is partly responsible for like a surgeon
lines.name: English

lines.value: madonna asked one of her friends how long it would take until yankovic satirized her song like a virgin into like a surgeon
lines.name: English

lines.value: this friend was a mutual friend of al's manager jay levey
lines.name: English

lines.value: when word got back to yankovic he decided it was a good idea and wrote the song
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is the only known time that yankovic has gotten a parody idea directly from the original artist
lines.name: English

lines.value: the third parody recorded for the album was a parody of i want a new drug by huey lewis and the news entitled i want a new duck
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the recording of i want a new duck yankovic was comfortable with releasing the album as it was
lines.name: English

lines.value: however scotti bros insisted that yankovic include a parody of a cyndi lauper song
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic begrudgingly complied producing girls just wanna have lunch
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic has cited it as one of his least favorite songs and ultimately left it off his 1993 compilation album the food album
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic also approached prince about a potential parody of when doves cry circa 1984
lines.name: English

lines.value: prince refused and did not accept any future parody ideas yankovic presented to him
lines.name: English

lines.value: on march 25 1985 yankovic rounded out the recording of his new album with a polka medley of then popular songs in music
lines.name: English

lines.value: dare to be stupid also includes george of the jungle the only straight cover song released by yankovic not counting his polka medleys
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song later ended up on the soundtrack to the 1997 film of the same name
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the release of the album yankovic undertook the 70-city stupid tour this was his biggest tour of the 1980s and featured costume changes carefully designed lighting and several of al's videos cleverly integrated into the stage show
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic's on stage wardrobe changed dramatically during the tour and he specifically stipulated that every promoter had to supply one garish hawaiian shirt for him to wear
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic eventually acquired a couple closets full of them
lines.name: English

lines.value: yankovic also started wearing exclusively vans and joked that whenever i need some they let me go to their warehouse and take home an armload the videos that were made to promote dare to be stupid were later compiled with additional material into a direct to video mockumentary called the compleat al the video directed by yankovic's manager jay levey and robert k weiss was one of the first programs of its kind to be made specifically for the home video market
lines.name: English

lines.value: a 60-minute version was later aired on showtime
lines.name: English

lines.value: to go along with the video the tongue in cheek book the authorized al was also released
lines.name: English

lines.value: the book co written by yankovic and tino insana has since gone out of print
lines.name: English

lines.value: dare to be stupid received moderately favorable reviews from critics
lines.name: English

lines.value: allmusic reviewer eugene chadbourne awarded the album three and a half stars and cited like a surgeon and dare to be stupid as some of yankovic's best songs
lines.name: English

lines.value: christopher thelen from the daily vault wrote that while dare to be stupid is not yankovic's finest album [...] there's enough on this one to recommend it
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song yoda has gone on to become one of yankovic's most famous songs
lines.name: English

lines.value: although it was left off his first greatest hits album the song was featured on the second volume the box set permanent record and the 2009 compilation the essential weird al yankovic
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song appeared on the time machine episode of the weird al show and on the compilation album radio disney kid jams
lines.name: English

lines.value: although the lead single like a surgeon and the parody yoda were met with praise many criticized the album's other parodies
lines.name: English

lines.value: many critics were split on the amount of emphasis the original songs were given
lines.name: English

lines.value: rolling stone writer david hinkley positively wrote that the pick of this album's original litter is one more minute which is a parody of a style fifties vocal group rather than a specific song and is a superb tune besides - right down to the perfect little gasp right before the final chorus
lines.name: English

lines.value: in contrast chadbourne was disappointed with the original material stating that only someone who is missing important brain cells would suggest this artist's original songs are any good
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album was nominated for a grammy award for best comedy recording in 1986 though it lost to whoopi goldberg's whoopi original broadway recording
lines.name: English

lines.value: dare to be stupid was released on june 18 1985 it was the first album of musical comedy to be released on compact disc
lines.name: English

lines.value: dare to be stupid eventually peaked on the billboard 200 at number 50
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album spent a total of eight weeks on the chart
lines.name: English

lines.value: on january 27 1986 a little less than a year after its release the album was certified gold by the recording industry association of america riaa
lines.name: English

lines.value: on february 24 2003 the album was certified platinum by the riaa
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is a list of rivers in the us state of idaho
lines.name: English

lines.value: this list is arranged by drainage basin with respective tributaries indented under each larger stream's name
lines.name: English

lines.value: these basins are hydrologically linked to the snake river
lines.name: English

lines.value: *list of rivers in the united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greece national football team (, ) represents greece in association football and is controlled by the hellenic football federation the governing body for football in greece
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece's main home grounds are in the capital city athens at the karaiskakis stadium in piraeus and also the olympic stadium in maroussi
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece is one of only ten national teams to have been crowned uefa european champions
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the uefa euro 1980 greece made their first appearance in a major tournament and although they did not make it through the group stage their qualification to the then eight team tournament gave them a position in the top eight european football nations that year
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece had to wait until 1994 to experience their first fifa world cup participation but after an undefeated qualifying run they produced a poor performance in the final tournament losing all three group matches without scoring
lines.name: English

lines.value: the uefa euro 2004 marked a high point in greece's football history when they were crowned european champions in only their second participation in the tournament against all the odds
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks dismissed as rank outsiders before the tournament defeated some of the favourites in the competition including defending european champions france and hosts portugal with greece beating the latter in both the opening game of the tournament and again in the final
lines.name: English

lines.value: their triumph also gave them a qualification for the 2005 fifa confederations cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the decade after the 2004 victory greece qualified for the final tournaments of all but one major competitions entered reaching the quarter finals at the uefa euro 2012 and the round of 16 at the 2014 fifa world cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: moreover they occupied a place in the top 20 of the fifa world rankings for all but four months during that period and reached an all time high of eighth in the world from april to june 2008 as well as in october 2011
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first appearance of a greek national football team was at the 1906 intercalated games in athens
lines.name: English

lines.value: later the greek team participated in the inter allied games in paris following the end of world war i and in the 1920 summer olympics of antwerp recognized as first official by fifa
lines.name: English

lines.value: a notable figure during these years was giorgos kalafatis player and later manager of the team
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the next decades the greek team did not manage to have any success despite the passion of the greek people for football
lines.name: English

lines.value: the country's economical and social problems before and after world war ii did not allow successful preparation of the national team
lines.name: English

lines.value: at its best moment greece narrowly missed qualifying for the 1970 fifa world cup despite a good quality team including some of the greatest ever greek players such as mimis domazos giorgos sideris giorgos koudas and mimis papaioannou
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece under the guidance of alketas panagoulias made its first appearance in a major tournament at the euro 1980 in italy after qualifying top of a group that included the soviet union and hungary both world football powers
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the final tournament greece was drawn into group a with west germany the netherlands and czechoslovakia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their first game greece held the dutch until the only goal of the game was scored with a penalty kick by kist in the 65th minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: three days later greece played czechoslovakia in rome
lines.name: English

lines.value: after holding the czechoslovakians 1 1 at the end the first half greece eventually lost 3 1
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their last game greece earned a 0 0 draw against eventual winners west germany concluding what was considered a decent overall performance in the team's maiden presence in a final phase of any football competition
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team's success in qualifying for the 1994 fifa world cup in the united states marked the first time they had made it to the fifa world cup finals
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece finished first and undefeated in their qualifying group surpassing russia in the final game
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the final tournament greece were drawn into group d with nigeria bulgaria and argentina
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the successful qualifying campaign expectations back in greece were high as no one could imagine the oncoming astounding failure
lines.name: English

lines.value: most notable reason for this complete failure was the fact that legendary coach alketas panagoulias opted to take a squad full of those players - though most of them aging and out of form - that helped the team in the qualifying instead of new emerging talents seeing it as a reward for their unprecedented success
lines.name: English

lines.value: furthermore they had the disadvantage of being drawn into a group of death with runners up at the 1990 fifa world cup argentina later semifinalists bulgaria and nigeria one of the strongest african teams
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is worth mentioning that all players of the squad including the three goalkeepers took part in those three games something very rare
lines.name: English

lines.value: this tournament was humiliating for the greek squad
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their first game against argentina at foxboro stadium just outside boston they lost 4 0
lines.name: English

lines.value: four days later greece suffered another 4 0 blow from bulgaria at soldier field in chicago and then in what would be their final game they lost to nigeria 2 0 at foxboro stadium again
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the end greece were eliminated in the first round by losing all three games scoring no goals and conceding ten
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece failed to qualify for the euro 1996 finishing third in the group behind russia and scotland
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their 1998 world cup qualifying tournament the team finished only one point shy of second placed croatia after a 0 0 draw by the eventual group winners the danish
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their euro 2000 qualifying group greece finished again in third place two points behind second placed slovenia in a highly disappointing campaign that saw the team lose at home to latvia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 2002 world cup qualifying greece finished a disappointing fourth in their group behind england germany and finland which led to the sacking of coach vasilis daniil replaced by otto rehhagel
lines.name: English

lines.value: highlights of the campaign included a 5 1 defeat in finland and the 2 2 draw that followed in england the first two games of the soon to become legendary german coach at the reins of the greek national team
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece started the qualification process for the euro 2004 in poor fashion losing at home to spain and away to ukraine both times with a 2 0 scoreline
lines.name: English

lines.value: astonishingly the team went on to win their remaining six games including a highly decisive 1 0 away win over spain in their second matchup securing first place in the group and an appearance in the european championship finals for the first time in 24 years
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece were the second least favorite in the competition to win with latvia being the least favorite
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece were also considered as outsiders and underdogs and were given odds of 150 1 of winning before the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: they were drawn in group a ending up with portugal spain and russia a group of death portugal hosts and favourites to win spain former european champions and russia who won the first ever euro as the soviet union
lines.name: English

lines.value: very few people expected greece to proceed to the quarter finals let alone win the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the opening match against hosts portugal greece achieved a surprise 2 1 victory receiving the nickname pirate ship to neipatiko used by greek sportscasters in reference to the floating ship used in the tournament's opening ceremony
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece won with a 25-yard strike by giorgos karagounis and a penalty by angelos basinas
lines.name: English

lines.value: four days later greece stunned spain in front of a largely spanish crowd with a 1 1 draw after being down 1 0 at half time
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece fell behind from a defensive lapse which allowed fernando morientes to score
lines.name: English

lines.value: however a sublime diagonal pass by playmaker vasilios tsiartas allowed angelos charisteas to score an equaliser in the second half giving greece hope of qualifying
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the final group match greece fell behind 2 0 to russia who were already eliminated within the first ten minutes of the game but managed to pull one back through zisis vryzas and thus progressed to the next round at the expense of spain on goals scored
lines.name: English

lines.value: dmitri kirichenko had the chance to eliminate greece in the final minutes of this match but his stretched effort squeezed just wide
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the quarter finals greece faced off with the undefeated and reigning champions france
lines.name: English

lines.value: at 65 minutes greece took the lead
lines.name: English

lines.value: angelos basinas played a perfect pass to captain theodoros zagorakis who flicked the ball high in the air past veteran french defender bixente lizarazu and sent a perfect cross to angelos charisteas for the header and goal
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece held on to win despite a late french onslaught with close efforts by thierry henry thus knocking france out of euro 2004 and becoming the first team ever to defeat both the hosts and defending champions in the same tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece reached the semifinals to face the czech republic who were the only team to defeat all of their opponents to that point
lines.name: English

lines.value: the czech record included a convincing 3 2 win over the netherlands a 2 1 win over germany and a 3 0 win over denmark in the quarter finals
lines.name: English

lines.value: at this stage in the tournament the czechs were favourites to take the trophy
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game began nervously for greece as the czech republic applied much pressure
lines.name: English

lines.value: tomas rosicky hit the bar in the opening minutes and jan koller had several efforts saved by antonis nikopolidis
lines.name: English

lines.value: the czechs chances were dealt a blow when influential midfielder pavel nedved left the pitch injured in the first half
lines.name: English

lines.value: after 90 minutes the game ended 0 0 despite the czechs having most of the game's missed chances
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the final minute of the first half of extra time a close range silver goal header by traianos dellas from a vassilios tsiartas corner ended the czech campaign putting greece into the final of euro 2004 and sending their fans into raptures
lines.name: English

lines.value: for the first time in history the final was a repeat of the opening match with greece and hosts portugal facing off in a rematch
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 57th minute charisteas gave greece the lead with a header from a corner by angelos basinas
lines.name: English

lines.value: portugal had much of the possession but the greek defence was solid and dealt with most attacks
lines.name: English

lines.value: cristiano ronaldo had a good chance to equalise in the dying moments but could not apply a finish
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece held on to win 1 0 winning the tournament an achievement considered by many to be one of the greater football upsets in history if not the greatest
lines.name: English

lines.value: greek captain zagorakis was named the man of the tournament having led greece and made the most tackles in the entire tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece's victory shot them up in the fifa world rankings from 35th in june 2004 to 14th in july 2004
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is one of the largest upward moves in a single month in the top echelon of the rankings
lines.name: English

lines.value: the triumph of greece at euro 2004 is the biggest sporting achievement in the country's history for a team sport along with the successes of the greece national basketball team in the european championships of 1987 2005 and 2006 fiba world championship and the world championship title of greece women's national water polo team in 2011
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team has appeared on stamps and received medals from konstantinos stephanopoulos the president of greece archbishop christodoulos of athens and an ecstatic ovation from the country's population which came out to see the team drive with the trophy from the athens airport to the panathinaiko stadium where the greek political and religious leadership was awaiting them
lines.name: English

lines.value: the euro 2004 winners were selected as world team of the year at the 2005 laureus world sports award for team of the year
lines.name: English

lines.value: as euro 2004 winners greece qualified for the 2005 fifa confederations cup in germany
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece were drawn into group b along with 2002 world cup champions brazil 2004 asian champions japan and 2003 north america champions mexico
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece lost 3 0 to brazil and 1 0 to japan and drew 0 0 with mexico in a tournament that was seen mostly as a time for experimentation as players like stathis tavlaridis loukas vyntra mihalis sifakis ioannis amanatidis and theofanis gekas either received their first ever calls or earned their maiden caps in the national squad
lines.name: English

lines.value: after winning the euro 2004 greece were considered favourites to top their group in the 2006 world cup qualification
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team was drawn into group 2 along with ukraine turkey denmark albania georgia and kazakhstan
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their first qualifier greece could not handle the game with albania and lost 2 1
lines.name: English

lines.value: afterward their matches were followed by draws home and away respectively with turkey and ukraine before defeating kazakhstan 3 1 at home
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was thought that the team was back on course as the 2 1 win over denmark with thodoris zagorakis scoring his first ever goal in over 100 caps
lines.name: English

lines.value: this was followed by wins against georgia and albania and a respectable away draw with turkey
lines.name: English

lines.value: however despite dominating the game greece lost at home to ukraine 1 0 having two goals disallowed
lines.name: English

lines.value: three months later greece barely escaped embarrassment as they scraped to a 2 1 away win against kazakhstan in the dying seconds
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece was defeated 1 0 by denmark in copenhagen as chances for a qualification through a playoff looked dismal after the 1 0 win of turkey in kiev against the already qualified ukrainian side
lines.name: English

lines.value: in their last game greece defeated georgia finishing 4th four points behind first placed ukraine and two behind turkey
lines.name: English

lines.value: throughout the match the 30000 fans in the karaiskakis stadium chanted the name of otto rehhagel in their utmost support and he said afterwards even if 10 years pass part of my heart will be greek
lines.name: English

lines.value: there was a dissatisfaction with the selection of the team by otto rehhagel throughout qualification campaign from some journalists as they argued that he was sticking to exactly the same euro 2004 squad even though some players didn't even have a club and was overlooking others most notably ieroklis stoltidis of olympiacos and akis zikos of as monaco
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 25 may 2006 less than a month before the opening of the 2006 world cup in germany greece lost 1 0 to australia in a friendly match in front of 95103 people at the mcg in melbourne
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece was the highest ranked seed in the pots for qualification to the uefa euro 2008 in switzerland and austria and was drawn with turkey norway bosnia and herzegovina hungary moldova and malta being the only group which did not have a team represented at the 2006 world cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece began their euro 2008 campaign with victories over moldova norway and bosnia and herzegovina
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a result greece climbed 18 places in two months to 13th place in the october fifa world rankings
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 24 march 2007 greece lost their fourth game 4 1 against turkey in athens
lines.name: English

lines.value: nevertheless the team went on to win away to malta with the only goal coming in the 66th minute from an angelos basinas penalty beat hungary and moldova at home and drew 2 2 away to norway despite having hit the goalpost three times in this match
lines.name: English

lines.value: the draw in oslo was followed by a 3 2 home win against bosnia herzegovina and a 1 0 away win to turkey securing its presence to the euro 2008 finals at their old rival's home ground
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the last two matches greece smashed malta 5 0 in athens and defeated hungary with an away 2 1 win finishing first in their group with a total of 31 points the most points gained among any group
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the draw for the final tournament greece was seeded first as the defending european champion
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition to this greece climbed to the 11th place in the fifa world rankings thus they were seeded first for the draw of the european qualification zone for the world cup 2010 for the first time in their history
lines.name: English

lines.value: the draw for the euro 2008 finals was held on 2 december in switzerland greece were drawn in group d along with sweden spain and russia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in preparation for the tournament greece defeated portugal 2 1 on 26 march 2008 in a repeat of the euro 2004 opening and final match as a result greece moved up to an all time high eighth position in the fifa world rankings
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the tournament finals however the greek team lost all three games and scored only one goal
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece underperformed in the opening match against sweden and lost 2 0
lines.name: English

lines.value: they tried to recover in the match against russia but lost 1 0
lines.name: English

lines.value: having already been eliminated the greek team went all out against already qualified spain but lost 2 1 becoming the first defending champion not to earn a single point in the next european championship
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite the scoring prowess of europe's top 2010 world cup qualifying goal scorer theofanis gekas who produced 10 goals in as many games greece took second place to switzerland in group 2 of uefa qualification thus advancing to a home and away playoff round where they faced ukraine
lines.name: English

lines.value: after a scoreless draw at home in the first match the second leg in donetsk saw greece triumph with a 1 0 win sending the greeks to the 2010 fifa world cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the 2010 world cup draw in cape town south africa on 4 december 2009 greece found itself grouped with two familiar opponents from its first world cup appearance in 1994
lines.name: English

lines.value: argentina and nigeria were yet again drawn into group stage play alongside greece this time into group b with south korea replacing greece's third 1994 opponent bulgaria
lines.name: English

lines.value: in its world cup opener greece lost 2 0 to south korea after a dismal performance characterized by excessive long ball attacks and a lack of offensive creativity
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the second fixture against nigeria greece won 2 1 coming from behind after conceding an early goal
lines.name: English

lines.value: dimitris salpingidis scored greece's first ever goal in the world cup finals in the 44th minute of the first half to tie the match at 1 1
lines.name: English

lines.value: vasilis torosidis scored the winning goal in the 71st minute securing the first points and first victory for greece in tournament history
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the third match against heavily favoured argentina greece needed a combination of results to advance to the next round
lines.name: English

lines.value: as expected in what would be his final game as greece's national team head coach otto rehhagel conjured up a very defensive minded strategy leaving georgos samaras with nearly all offensive responsibilities as the lone striker
lines.name: English

lines.value: the strategy nearly paid off in the second half with the score still locked at 0 0 when samaras beat the last argentine defender on a quick long ball counter attack but curled a rushed shot just wide of the far post
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks held the argentines scoreless until the 77th minute but ultimately lost 2 0 finishing third in group b greece moved from 13th to 12th in the fifa world rankings following the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: russia croatia and france dropped lower than greece while uruguay and chile jumped ahead of the greeks
lines.name: English

lines.value: twenty four hours removed from greece's world cup loss to argentina otto rehhagel stepped away from his post as greek national team manager
lines.name: English

lines.value: eight days later a new era in greek football was ushered in as the hellenic football federation named former aek athens and paok boss fernando santos the new manager
lines.name: English

lines.value: under santos the greeks immediately went to work on an unprecedented streak of success setting a senior club record by going unbeaten in santos's first seventeen matches as manager
lines.name: English

lines.value: while greece's proficiency in stifling opposition attacks seemed to wane toward the end of rehhagel's tenure the emergence of santos seemed to galvanize greek defending once more
lines.name: English

lines.value: through seven international friendlies and ten euro 2012 qualifiers the greeks kept nine clean sheets and conceded just one goal in each of the remaining eight contests
lines.name: English

lines.value: from start to end of their unbeaten run santos's national side moved from 12 to 8 in fifa's world rankings equaling the highest mark in history credited by fifa to greece
lines.name: English

lines.value: only one match from their streak featured a team other than greece that appeared at the 2010 world cup a 1 0 defeat of serbia in belgrade
lines.name: English

lines.value: with its late game comeback victory over georgia in october 2011 greece padded its historic football tournament resume most importantly by sealing an automatic berth into uefa's 2012 european football championship tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: for the second time in team history the national side won its qualifying group for a major football tournament without a single loss incurred as greece also went undefeated in 1994 world cup qualifiers
lines.name: English

lines.value: adding to its 1980 2004 and 2008 euro qualifying campaigns the georgia triumph marked the fifth time overall that greece has won its qualification group for a major tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: although their tendency to produce positive results remained steady throughout qualifying so too did the greeks proclivity to start games slowly and concede early goals
lines.name: English

lines.value: this habit would plague the greeks through qualifying and eventually tarnish their euro 2012 performances
lines.name: English

lines.value: over two qualifying contests greece trailed georgia on the scoreboard for 130 of 180 minutes and still managed to grab four of six possible points in the standings by way of three late strikes
lines.name: English

lines.value: goals scored in the dying minutes of games often coming from defenders became somewhat of a greek signature on group f's table
lines.name: English

lines.value: in fact greece was able to take and keep a first half lead just once in ten games the 3 1 home defeat of malta which was ranked 50th of 53 teams in europe
lines.name: English

lines.value: in malta a last second tie breaking strike from defender vasilis torosidis pocketed a crucial extra two points in the standings for greece the same number of points it held over croatia at the end of qualifying
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite allowing weaker teams in the group to bring the game to them the greeks admirably held powerful croatia scoreless through two meetings and deservedly won group f four days after a decisive 2 0 home win versus the second place croats
lines.name: English

lines.value: theofanis gekas who retired from national team service in 2010 after fernando santos's third game as manager came out of retirement in time to contribute a goal to the result
lines.name: English

lines.value: gekas was eventually included in santos's 23-man euro 2012 roster leaving out euro 2004 hero angelos charisteas who scored the group clinching goal in the aforementioned greek qualifying victory in georgia
lines.name: English

lines.value: shades of 2004 was a commonly perceived theme regarding the buildup to euro 2012 for the greeks and their progression through the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: as in 2004 greece was drawn into the same group as the host nation poland on this occasion and also had the pressure of playing in the tournament's opening match
lines.name: English

lines.value: two familiar foes from its 2004 championship run russia and czech republic joined greece and poland in group a on 2 december 2011 at the tournament's final draw in kiev
lines.name: English

lines.value: upon drawing the lowest ranked teams from pots 1 and 2 as well as the second lowest from pot 4 greece's prospects of passing the group stage at euro 2012 were given a boost
lines.name: English

lines.value: ideas of steering to piratiko to a dream start in host nation territory as greece did in portugal eight years before rapidly turned sour during the opening match's first half
lines.name: English

lines.value: from the outset the greeks appeared uncomfortable holding the ball for long spells and seemed content to allow hosts poland to push numbers forward with the ball hoping to score through counter attacks
lines.name: English

lines.value: however poland made the most of its early possession as top scorer robert lewandowski converted a header from a goal line cross past a scurrying kostas chalkias
lines.name: English

lines.value: hope and momentum continued to tip in favor of poland when sokratis papastathopoulos received his second yellow card of the game in just the 44th minute from spanish referee carlos velasco carballo
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks however began to boss the game after halftime while playing down a man
lines.name: English

lines.value: dimitris salpingidis made the greatest impact on the game for greece as a second half substitute making brilliant penetrating runs behind the polish defense eventually bringing the game level 1 1 on a mistake by poland keeper wojciech szczesny
lines.name: English

lines.value: salpingidis was then responsible for levelling up the numbers for the greeks when szczesny made a redcard foul on salpingidis breakaway attempt on goal in the 68th minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: but greek captain giorgos karagounis's subsequent penalty kick was turned away by substitute keeper przemyslaw tyton
lines.name: English

lines.value: a second goal by salpingidis was disallowed as he was assisted by an offside kostas fortounis denying greece's best opportunity to take three points from what ended as an improbable 1 1 draw
lines.name: English

lines.value: the czech republic exploited greece's weakness at the left defender position early in the second group stage match notching two goals in the first six minutes
lines.name: English

lines.value: just as poland had the czechs repeatedly penetrated the greek back line behind left side defender jose cholevas scoring on a through ball and a cross from cholevas's side
lines.name: English

lines.value: petr cech's gaffe on a georgios samaras cross in the second half turned into a gift goal for theofanis gekas
lines.name: English

lines.value: the czechs then eased off on their early pressure opting to sit back and guard their lead for much of the second half but gekas goal was too little too late
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece lost the match 2 1 placing them at the foot of group a in need of a victory over the attack minded russians to advance to the knockout rounds
lines.name: English

lines.value: after thrashing the czech republic 4 1 and displaying more offensive potency in a 1 1 draw with poland the russians were favored to earn the one point they needed to advance against the greeks
lines.name: English

lines.value: however greece delivered a trademark 1 0 defensive victory and advanced to the euro 2012 quarterfinals
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks scored when russian defender sergei ignashevich errantly headed a greece throw in behind the russian defense for giorgos karagounis to pounce on
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece's captain sprinted in on goal and struck the ball at the back post under keeper vyacheslav malafeev in first half stoppage time to send the russians reeling into the locker rooms
lines.name: English

lines.value: ignashevich appeared to have conceded an additional golden scoring opportunity for greece upon tripping karagounis in the russian penalty area early in the second half but referee jonas eriksson instead booked karagounis for what he believed to be simulation
lines.name: English

lines.value: this being karagounis's second yellow card of the tournament greece was to be without its suspended captain in the next round
lines.name: English

lines.value: with that victory greece qualified to the quarterfinals for a second time after their successful euro 2004 campaign
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the quarter finals greece met with a germany side that won all three of its group matches against portugal denmark and the netherlands
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece applied very little pressure in the midfield in the opening period slowing the tempo of the game and affording the germans the majority of possession
lines.name: English

lines.value: young sotiris ninis switched off momentarily in defence allowing german captain philipp lahm to cut infield and open the scoring with a long distance strike
lines.name: English

lines.value: yet the greeks remained calm as in georgos samaras they carried a constant threat
lines.name: English

lines.value: on the counter attack they pulled level early in the second half regaining possession in their defensive third giorgos fotakis found dimitris salpingidis streaking 40 yards deep into german territory
lines.name: English

lines.value: salpingidis delivered a ball five yards in front of goalkeeper manuel neuer which georgos samaras was able to meet and power underneath neuer for the equalizer
lines.name: English

lines.value: twenty minutes later however the germans led 4 1
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece scored an 89th minute penalty kick by salpingidis but the match ended 4 2 to the germans ending greece's euro 2012 campaign
lines.name: English

lines.value: to reach the 2014 world cup in brazil greece had to contend with a team on the rise in bosnia and herzegovina and a dangerous slovakian side seemingly in decline since its memorable 2010 world cup qualifying and finals performances
lines.name: English

lines.value: latvia a familiar qualification foe for greece in its previous two major tournaments 2010 world cup euro 2012 joined the fray as well
lines.name: English

lines.value: ahead of those aforesaid tournaments bosnia twice narrowly missed out on its first major international tournament appearance due to [[bosnia and herzegovina national football team#blazevic leads team to world cup 2010 play offs|consecutive playoff defeats]] at the hands of portugal
lines.name: English

lines.value: no playoff would be necessary for bosnia in 2013 as it won its qualifying group over greece on goal difference
lines.name: English

lines.value: the decisive match was in bosnia on 22 march when greece succumbed to three set piece goals two free kick headers and one penalty miss rebound in a 3 1 defeat
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece's defense proved rigid throughout qualifying conceding zero goals in open play
lines.name: English

lines.value: four goals were allowed by the greeks in ten games the first of which was a penalty by latvia and yet four goals were too many for a relatively unproductive greek attack to overcome
lines.name: English

lines.value: though greece was shut out just once the team only managed to score 12 goals an output bosnia reached in its second game
lines.name: English

lines.value: 2014 fifa world cup qualifying play offs following group play romania which claimed second place over hungary and turkey in a group dominated by the dutch awaited greece in a two legged playoff
lines.name: English

lines.value: the last time the two sides met in late 2011 romania came into greece and dealt fernando santos his first defeat as greece manager in his 18th game at the helm
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks reversed the prior 3 1 result in their favour this time scoring each goal through skillful one touch passing and finishing
lines.name: English

lines.value: kostas mitroglou accounted for three of greece's four goals in a 4 2 aggregate playoff victory though none were actual game winners
lines.name: English

lines.value: dimitris salpingidis notched the game winner in piraeus while the second leg finished 1 1 in bucharest
lines.name: English

lines.value: aracaju was chosen as the team's base camp for the tournament in brazil
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece was drawn into group c with colombia cote d'ivoire and japan and ultimately created for itself an extraordinarily similar tournament experience as it did two years prior at euro 2012
lines.name: English

lines.value: the greeks were put in an early 1 0 hole in their first game against a colombia team whose exuberant fans generated a hostile away environment
lines.name: English

lines.value: following its historical penchant greece thrived playing from behind as the underdog
lines.name: English

lines.value: panagiotis kone narrowly missed equalizing just one minute after colombia's fifth minute goal
lines.name: English

lines.value: trailing 2 0 in the 63rd minute theofanis gekas's header off a cross six yards from an open goal caromed off the crossbar for greece's best chance of the match
lines.name: English

lines.value: the colombians proved to be the more clinical finishers prevailing over the europeans 3 0 despite an even number of goal shots for both teams and a slight possession advantage in greece's favor
lines.name: English

lines.value: to stave off the threat of elimination the greeks needed to earn at least a point in their second match with japan who sat alongside them at the bottom of group c the task grew more difficult once two errant slide tackles by captain kostas katsouranis each drew yellow cards and reduced greece to ten men in the 38th minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: eight greek players on the pitch had endured the same scenario against poland in 2012 and once again their resolve did not break
lines.name: English

lines.value: japan controlled much of possession in a 0 0 draw and remained tied with greece on points due to poor finishing from close range
lines.name: English

lines.value: the draw made it necessary for greece to defeat ivory coast in its final group match in order to reach the round of 16 for the first time in its history
lines.name: English

lines.value: unlike its mirror scenario final group match against russia in euro 2012 the greeks came out as the aggressors from the outset against ivory coast
lines.name: English

lines.value: an early injury to center midfielder panagiotis kone brought on young olympiacos midfielder andreas samaris who would score his first international goal after intercepting a faulty back pass by an ivorian defender
lines.name: English

lines.value: also unlike its 2012 match with russia capitalizing on a first half opponent miscue would not be enough to carry greece to a needed victory
lines.name: English

lines.value: swansea city striker wilfried bony equalized for ivory coast in the 73rd minute
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ivorians promptly adopted greece's defensive strategy but could not hold out until the game's end
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the first minute of stoppage time ivory coast striker giovanni sio obstructed a georgos samaras shot by clipping him from behind in the ivorian penalty area resulting in a greek penalty kick which samaras converted with 30 seconds remaining in the game to wild celebrations in greece
lines.name: English

lines.value: as group c runners up greece was paired in a playoff with group d shock winner costa rica who won its first ever world cup group stage over former world champions uruguay italy and england
lines.name: English

lines.value: trailing 1 0 but dominating possession due in part to a second yellow card to costa rican oscar duarte the greeks forced overtime through a sokratis papastathopoulos equalizer ten seconds into stoppage time
lines.name: English

lines.value: this would prove to be the only goal costa rica goalkeeper keylor navas would concede in open play throughout the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: navas stayed strong to turn away several significant opportunities for the greeks throughout the 30 minutes of extra time including a theofanis gekas penalty in the game's concluding penalty shootout
lines.name: English

lines.value: costa rica claimed its first world cup knockout stage victory and denied greece its first by defeating the greeks 5 3 on penalties
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team appointed claudio ranieri as head coach in july 2014
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was sacked in november of the same year after a shocking home defeat to the faroe islands
lines.name: English

lines.value: sergio markarian was appointed in his place but he too has come under fire especially after a second loss at the hand of the faroe islands and the team's terrible performances in the remaining uefa euro 2016 qualifying
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team's form since september 2014 has been abysmal with no wins in over a year losing to romania the faroe islands twice finland northern ireland and even luxembourg in a friendly match over that period
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece finished in bottom place in their euro qualifying group earning just one victory against hungary in the final round and failing to qualify for the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece along with holland and bosnia and herzegovina were the only nations from pot 1 not to qualify for the finals
lines.name: English

lines.value: those three had taken part in the 2014 fifa world cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: incidentally the three teams would also fail to qualify for the world cup in 2018
lines.name: English

lines.value: in attempting to qualify for the 2018 world cup greece would suffer a second successive failure to reach a major tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: they finished second in group h of the european qualifying stages nine points behind runaway leaders belgium and only two points clear of third placed bosnia and herzegovina
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece began their qualification campaign well with three straight wins against gibraltar cyprus and estonia only conceding one goal in the process and they remained unbeaten for seven matches after drawing their next four games two of which ended 1 1 in succession against bosnia and belgium and the other two ended 0 0 in the return fixtures against bosnia and estonia
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece then lost 2 1 to group leaders belgium but managed to beat cyprus and gibraltar to ensure second place in the group and qualification for the play off round
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece were subsequently drawn against croatia in the play off round where they were knocked out over two legs a 4 1 away defeat set the tone for greece's campaign and in the second leg they drew a blank in a meek 0 0 stalemate against the croats to signify the end of their world cup hopes
lines.name: English

lines.value: kostas mitroglou finished as greece's top scorer throughout their campaign scoring six goals
lines.name: English

lines.value: traditionally greece have spent most of their history playing their home matches in different stadiums primarily in athens but also in a number of other cities around the country
lines.name: English

lines.value: the current home ground of the national team is the karaiskakis stadium in piraeus permanently used since its reconstruction in 2004
lines.name: English

lines.value: since their first international game in 1929 and for the next 33 years greece constantly used as home ground the apostolos nikolaidis stadium
lines.name: English

lines.value: their first home match away from it was played at the nikos goumas stadium in 1962 while the karaiskakis stadium was used for a first time in 1964 when it was renovated
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1966 the kaftanzoglio stadium in thessaloniki became the first stadium outside of athens to be used
lines.name: English

lines.value: since then all these stadiums were alternately used until the early 1980s while some other stadiums were inaugurated by the national team such as the thessaloniki's toumba stadium and harilaou stadium in 1975 and 1977 respectively along with greece's first visits in 1976 to grounds outside of the two major cities such as the panachaiki stadium in patras and the kavala stadium in kavala
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1982 the georgios kamaras stadium was added to the list of home grounds for the national team the first in athens out of the three major stadiums
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 1 december 1982 the newly built athens olympic stadium to date the largest stadium in the country housed the national team for a first time and served as its primary home ground for the rest of the 1980s and the 1990s
lines.name: English

lines.value: meanwhile a large number of matches was held in various stadiums including old choices and some new in provincial cities all over the country something that did not change neither in the early 2000s when the athens olympic stadium was almost abandoned
lines.name: English

lines.value: even since 2004 and the use mainly of the karaiskakis stadium few greece's matches have occasionally been played in other stadiums as well
lines.name: English

lines.value: greece's traditional colours are blue and white originating from the colours of the greek flag
lines.name: English

lines.value: although blue was used for home kit since the team's inception since their uefa euro 2004 triumph their home kit has changed to white
lines.name: English

lines.value: in recent decades greece wear either a set of white jerseys shorts and socks or an all blue combination
lines.name: English

lines.value: formerly a combination of blue jerseys and white shorts and vice versa has also been used
lines.name: English

lines.value: meanwhile greece's kit has occasionally featured stripes crosses or other designs as well as various values of blue
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 10 april 2013 it was announced the partnership between the hellenic football federation and american manufacturer nike which is greece's current official supplier with their first kit debuting on 7 june 2013 in the away match to lithuania
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 4 march 2014 greece unveiled their latest kit also worn at the 2014 fifa world cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: before that briefly the greece's former suppliers were adidas 2003-2013 lotto 1998-2001 le coq sportif 2001-2003 diadora 1992-1998 puma until 1990 and asics euro 1980
lines.name: English

lines.value: as of 7 june 2013 nike took over the sponsorship rights of the greek national football team
lines.name: English

lines.value: the crest eovoonuo means national sign which is used in the kit is the official emblem of the national team
lines.name: English

lines.value: traditionally greece is referred to by the media and the greeks in general simply as ethniki eovikn in greek which literally means national
lines.name: English

lines.value: the team is often called galanolefki sky blue white due to the use of the colours of the greek flag as kit colours
lines.name: English

lines.value: both nicknames are used for the country's national teams in other sports as well
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the opening ceremony at the uefa euro 2004 which took place right before the inaugural game of the tournament between greece and hosts portugal a replica of a 16th-century ship was used referring to the expeditions of the portuguese explorers of that time
lines.name: English

lines.value: greek radio sports journalist georgios helakis while broadcasting the opening match commented that since the portuguese team appeared in such a ship it's time for us to become pirates and steal the victory
lines.name: English

lines.value: eventually greece beat the hosts and the team was described as piratiko meaning the pirate ship which emerged as the new nickname of the team repeated at every win during the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: especially after the greek win in the final to portugal the new nickname was established to commemorate the coronation of greece as european champions
lines.name: English

lines.value: martin edward corry mbe born 12 october 1973 is a retired english rugby union footballer who played at number eight blindside flanker or lock for bristol rugby and leicester tigers and represented england and the british and irish lions
lines.name: English

lines.value: born in birmingham corry was educated at tunbridge wells grammar school and the university of northumbria and first played rugby union for tunbridge wells minis and the first team before joining newcastle gosforth and later bristol
lines.name: English

lines.value: he broke his contract at bristol to move to leicester tigers in 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry was one of leicester's core forwards for several seasons an integral part of leicester tigers success over this period and was the club's captain during his tenure there
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry started both the 2001 and 2002 heineken cup finals
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry captained leicester from the retirement of johnson and back in 2005 until his eventual retirement in 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: during this time leicester won the premiership 3 times and appeared in every final
lines.name: English

lines.value: they also reached the heineken cup final in 2006
lines.name: English

lines.value: during his career he has worked his way up the full representative ladder representing england at schools students u21 and a level
lines.name: English

lines.value: he made his england debut against argentina on the 1997 tour there with the main players playing on the 1997 british lions tour
lines.name: English

lines.value: because of his ability to play either at lock blindside or number 8 he was often used as an impact substitute
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2001 he was called up to the british and irish lions side after the tour had started due to injuries within the squad and immediately impressed graham henry the lions coach
lines.name: English

lines.value: he started the first test in the absence of the injured neil back and replaced the injured richard hill in the second before starting the third test in the absence of hill
lines.name: English

lines.value: his subsequent international form has been varied after playing in the delayed six nations decider in dublin in october 2001 corry missed out on the autumn internationals but was a bench replacement for the 2002 six nations
lines.name: English

lines.value: he confirmed his selection for clive woodward's rugby world cup squad in a highly competitive back row area with a strong late run in england's warm up matches he performed well in the 43 9 defeat of wales at the millennium stadium in late summer of 2003 and then again in the september defeat of france at twickenham
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was part of england's 2003 world cup winning squad chosen ahead of teammate graham rowntree
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the 2003 rugby world cup corry flew home from australia for the birth of his first child daughter eve
lines.name: English

lines.value: he rejoined the squad days later and played in england's victory over uruguay
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2005 he was named as england captain for the six nations match against italy and scotland in the absence of jason robinson
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the summer he was selected for his second lions tour this time to new zealand and was made vice captain for the first test
lines.name: English

lines.value: he went on to captain the team from the 2nd minute onwards as brian o'driscoll was injured in a notorious spear tackle incident
lines.name: English

lines.value: however he was dropped for the final two tests in favour of ryan jones
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was again selected as england's captain for the 2005 autumn internationals and 2006 six nations tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: he continued as captain for the autumn internationals of 2006 in which england lost to new zealand argentina and south africa
lines.name: English

lines.value: following these results england head coach andy robinson left his post and was replaced by brian ashton
lines.name: English

lines.value: in his first squad selection as england coach ashton named corry in the starting line up for the 2007 six nations opener against scotland though he was replaced as captain by phil vickery
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry remained in the side as the tournament progressed but in the final two games of the tournament against france and wales he was moved to lock
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2007 corry formed part of the ashton's rugby world cup squad in which england progressed to the final in paris but were ultimately unable to defend their world title losing to south africa
lines.name: English

lines.value: the following year corry reportedly turned down ashton's offer of a place in the england's squad for the opening fixture of their 2008 six nations campaign instead announcing his retirement from international rugby at the age of 34
lines.name: English

lines.value: in may 2009 corry announced that he was retiring at the end of the 2008/09 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: he captained the barbarians against england at twickenham on the 30 may 2009 to a 33 26 victory
lines.name: English

lines.value: in november 2009 corry announced his involvement in ruckingball.com an online community for the development of school boy rugby coaches and parents
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry is a keen supporter of scarborough fc having first been taken to watch the club as a child when his grandfather had a house in the town
lines.name: English

lines.value: corry jetted back from australia during the 2003 rwc for the birth of his first child a daughter called eve
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was literally a flying visit as he rejoined the squad just a few days later
lines.name: English

lines.value: his son edward was born soon after the end of the 2006 rbs 6 nations championship and daughter tess was born in 2009
lines.name: English
