lines.name: English

lines.value: henry andrew pogorzelski september 26 1922 december 30 2015 was an american mathematician of polish descent a professor of mathematics at the university of maine
lines.name: English

lines.value: much of pogorzelski's research concerns the goldbach conjecture the still unsolved problem of whether every even number can be represented as a sum of two prime numbers
lines.name: English

lines.value: born in harrison new jersey pogorzelski served in the us army in world war ii
lines.name: English

lines.value: he served as editor of mathematical reviews from 1957 to 1964 and studied at the institute for advanced study under andre weil
lines.name: English

lines.value: he received his phd from cuny in 1969 under the advisor raymond smullyan his dissertation was on goldbach sentences in some abstract arithmetics constructed from a generalization of ordinary recursive arithmetic
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1974 after he had joined the maine faculty he was the only american invited by the polish academy of science to visit poland for the celebration of the 500th anniversary of the birth of copernicus
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2002 the university of maine attempted to suspend pogorzelski from teaching duties but backed down after he filed an age discrimination complaint
lines.name: English

lines.value: as well as holding a faculty position at the university of maine pogorzelski was the director of the research institute for mathematics formerly known as the research institute for semiological mathematics an independent research institute located near the university of maine in orono maine and modeled after the institute for advanced study
lines.name: English

lines.value: he proposed in 1993 to offer doctorates through the institute the proposal was rejected at the time but the research institute for mathematics is now the only institution in maine that grants doctoral degrees in mathematics
lines.name: English

lines.value: henry pogorzelski died december 30 2015 in orono maine
lines.name: English

lines.value: bullialdus is a lunar impact crater located in the western part of the mare nubium
lines.name: English

lines.value: to the north by north west is the broken rimmed and lava flooded crater lubiniezky north northeast of bullialdus is gould nearly east southeast of bullialdus is wolf and south west of bullialdus lies the smaller crater konig
lines.name: English

lines.value: the relatively isolated location of this crater serves to highlight its well formed shape
lines.name: English

lines.value: bullialdus has a high outer rim that is circular but observers have noted a slightly polygonal appearance
lines.name: English

lines.value: the inner walls are d and contain many signs of landslips
lines.name: English

lines.value: the outer s are covered in a wide ejecta blanket that highlights a radial pattern of low ridges and valleys
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the center of the crater is a formation of several peaks and rises that climb to over a kilometer in height
lines.name: English

lines.value: a raised ridge runs from the peaks to the south east until finally merging with the inner wall
lines.name: English

lines.value: the floor of the crater is generally rough with many low rises
lines.name: English

lines.value: overall it has a somewhat convex shape bulging upward toward the middle
lines.name: English

lines.value: when the sun is at a high angle the rim and central mountains appear brighter than the surroundings and white patches can be viewed on the crater floor
lines.name: English

lines.value: infrared studies of the crater region have revealed at least three layers of strata
lines.name: English

lines.value: the impact may also have intersected a mafic pluton which means a crystallized body of igneous rock that has high concentrations of heavier elements such as magnesium in this case
lines.name: English

lines.value: two smaller but notable craters lie just to the south of the main crater
lines.name: English

lines.value: bullialdus a lies just to the south west of bullialdus within its ramparts
lines.name: English

lines.value: to the south of bullialdus a is the slightly smaller bullialdus b
lines.name: English

lines.value: by convention these features are identified on lunar maps by placing the letter on the side of the crater midpoint that is closest to bullialdus
lines.name: English

lines.value: * s tompkins et al distribution and geologic history of materials excavated by the lunar crater bullialdus twenty fourth lunar and planetary science conference part 3 1993
lines.name: English

lines.value: * bullialdus at the moon wiki
lines.name: English

lines.value: :richard harwood is also the assumed name of national front member richard verrall
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard craig harwood born 8 august 1979 is a british cellist
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard harwood was born in portsmouth hampshire and began learning to play the piano aged four teachers included diana bell and joyce rathbone and the cello aged five
lines.name: English

lines.value: he attended ditcham park school
lines.name: English

lines.value: he achieved his associated board grade 8 in cello aged 8 and in piano aged 11.after beginning cello studies with two local teachers richard studied with joan dickson from 1988 until her death in 1994 before continuing with steven doane and david waterman 1994-1999 heinrich schiff 1999-2003 at the university of music and dramatic art vienna and ralph kirshbaum 2003-2005 at the royal northern college of music manchester
lines.name: English

lines.value: he complemented his studies by taking master classes and lessons with mstislav rostropovich janos starker steven isserlis boris pergamenschikow miklos perenyi bernard greenhouse valentin erben alban berg quartet william pleeth zara nelsova and ferenc rados
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard made his concerto debut at the age of ten playing the g minor kabalevsky concerto at the adrian boult hall birmingham and since then has gone on to perform concerti and recitals in major venues including the royal albert hall royal festival hall queen elizabeth hall wigmore hall musikverein concertgebouw alte oper thomaskirche and the auditorium du louvre
lines.name: English

lines.value: as concerto soloist richard has collaborated with conductors such as john wilson okko kamu marko letonja douglas bostock en shao shuntaro sato david parry and yehudi menuhin and with numerous orchestras including the philharmonia bournemouth symphony orchestra rt&eacute concert orchestra auckland philharmonia orchestra and the ural philharmonic orchestra
lines.name: English

lines.value: as chamber musician he has collaborated with the jerusalem and endellion quartets gidon kremer yuri bashmet olivier charlier benjamin schmid alena baeva ilya gringolts pekka kuusisto vilde frang chen halevi julian bliss martin roscoe finghin collins ashley wass gottlieb wallisch and julius drake among others
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2014 richard became the cellist of the sitkovetsky trio
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard is regularly heard on bbc having made his bbc radio 3 debut at the age of thirteen with a live recording of the elgar concerto
lines.name: English

lines.value: he has also given performances for radio france mdr rt&eacute and radio new zealand
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard's discography include a critically acclaimed debut disc for emi classics recorded with pianist christoph berner and composing without the picture a 2013 solo album of concert works written by film composers on resonus
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition richard can be seen and heard in phil grabsky's 2009 documentary in search of beethoven which received its theatrical premiere at the barbican theatre london was broadcast on sky arts and shown in cinemas worldwide
lines.name: English

lines.value: contemporary music plays an important role for richard
lines.name: English

lines.value: this started in 2002 when he took part in the park lane group young artists series on the south bank and premiered solo works written for him by dominic muldowney and martin butler
lines.name: English

lines.value: he has also worked with philip grange giving the london premiere of his nocturnal image and given the european premiere of david horne's zip with the composer at the piano
lines.name: English

lines.value: for his solo album composing without the picture richard premiered works written for him by christopher gunning alex heffes fernando velazquez and benjamin wallfisch
lines.name: English

lines.value: richard has won numerous awards including the 2004 pierre fournier award for cellists
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1992 he became the youngest ever winner of the audi junior musician award
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition he won the worshipful company of musicians maisie lewis young artists award in 2001 and in 2004 richard became the first british cellist ever to be awarded the title bachpreistrager at the international johann sebastian bach competition leipzig
lines.name: English

lines.value: among many other accolades he received the special mention prize from the jury at the concours de violoncelle rostropovitch paris in 2005
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1997 bbc music magazine selected him in their worldwide who's who edition and in 2000 richard was entered into the international who's who in music as an up and coming talent on the brink of worldwide recognition richard plays a cello by francesco ruggieri dated 1692
lines.name: English

lines.value: steklov institute of mathematics or steklov mathematical institute () is a premier research institute based in moscow specialized in mathematics and a part of the russian academy of sciences
lines.name: English

lines.value: the institute is named after vladimir andreevich steklov who in 1919 founded the institute of physics and mathematics in leningrad
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1934 this institute was split into separate parts for physics and mathematics and the mathematical part became the steklov institute
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the same time it was moved to moscow
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first director of the steklov institute was ivan matveyevich vinogradov from 1961-1964 the institute's director was the notable mathematician sergei chernikov
lines.name: English

lines.value: the old building of the institute in leningrad became its department in leningrad
lines.name: English

lines.value: today that department has become a separate institute called the [[st petersburg department of steklov institute of mathematics of russian academy of sciences]] or pdmi ras located in saint petersburg russia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the name st petersburg department is misleading however because the st petersburg department is now an independent institute
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1966 the moscow based keldysh institute of applied mathematics russian nhctntyt npnknaahon matematnkn nm
lines.name: English

lines.value: m.b.kenawa split off from the steklov institute
lines.name: English

lines.value: kbig 104.3 fm 104.3 myfm is an fm radio station in los angeles california owned by iheartmedia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station plays a hot adult contemporary format heavy on music from current hits through the 1990s
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station has studios located in burbank and its transmitter is based on mount wilson
lines.name: English

lines.value: kbig was first founded by john h poole in 1952 as an am radio station originating from catalina island off the coast of california
lines.name: English

lines.value: known as the catalina island station poole knew kbig would have wide coverage of southern california by broadcasting the station's directional signal across ocean water
lines.name: English

lines.value: kbig was heard from santa barbara to san diego including the large audience in los angeles
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station became popular presenting an island theme and scheduling music news and commercials on a different sequence from his competitors
lines.name: English

lines.value: we knew if you changed stations during a commercial you would always find music on k big poole claimed
lines.name: English

lines.value: the call letters were named in honor of the station's original disc jockey carl mr big bailey
lines.name: English

lines.value: the am station was sold to religious broadcasters in 1980 and now operates as 740 kbrt
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1959 kbig began simulcasting its am signal on the 104.3 fm frequency where kbig continues to broadcast today
lines.name: English

lines.value: the format was beautiful music playing lush instrumental versions of hollywood broadway and pop songs with an occasional vocal
lines.name: English

lines.value: kbig also had its staff of kbig singers who would sing the station's jingles and also record station albums to offer to listeners
lines.name: English

lines.value: over time the beautiful music format began to age
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1987 the station dropped instrumentals and became a soft adult contemporary station placing it as a direct competitor to 103.5 kost which had made a similar transition a few years earlier
lines.name: English

lines.value: both stations enjoyed high ratings and were heard in many los angeles offices and work places
lines.name: English

lines.value: by 1990 kbig dropped the 1960s songs and began playing more current hits
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1992 kbig shifted towards hot ac
lines.name: English

lines.value: this lasted until 1995 when kbig moved back towards mainstream ac to again compete against kost
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 1990s kbig was home to disco saturday night in late 1996 kbig once again moved toward a hot ac format
lines.name: English

lines.value: bonneville decided to sell kbig to chancellor in 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: in exchange chancellor sold kzla to bonneville
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1998 the station relaunched as the new k big 104 replaced most of its airstaff and switched back to a mainstream ac format
lines.name: English

lines.value: during this time kbig briefly became the los angeles area affiliate to the nationally syndicated delilah show
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1999 chancellor acquired kost and kfi from cox radio
lines.name: English

lines.value: the same year chancellor and capstar had merged forming amfm inc with amfm now owning kost management moved kbig to a hot ac format with a lean on 80s gold uptempo ac currents and rhythmic pop
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2000 amfm was purchased by clear channel communications now iheartmedia
lines.name: English

lines.value: on july 18 2005 kbig made major changes by cutting back on commercial time concentrating on 30 minute music sweeps dropped the jingles and the top of the hour ids i.e " it's four o'clock in the west " would no longer be heard and tweaked the musical direction by focusing on less currents and more recurrents from the 1980s and 1990s with most of the music leaning towards a rhythmic approach
lines.name: English

lines.value: djs also began to read out the individual letters of the station's id k b i g instead of the k big although briefly in the summer of 2007 the k big 104 slogan would sometimes be used
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2003 david chachi denes became kbig's program director at the young age of 28.in july 2006 kbig also began expanding dance mixes to weekends
lines.name: English

lines.value: usually the mixes were featured on its nightly programs boogie nights 7 p.m to 10 p.m monday thursday and 7 p.m to 12 a.m fridays and thump radio midnight to 5 a.m friday saturday
lines.name: English

lines.value: while some suspected a shift to a dance direction kbig management insisted that there were no changes in the works at the time
lines.name: English

lines.value: on august 17 2006 kbig picked up new competition as emmis communications changed longtime country music rival kzla to rhythmic adult contemporary as moving 93.9 kmvn the move gave los angeles two stations with a rhythmic sounding direction aimed at adults even though kbig was technically an adult top 40
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2007 emmis launched a $5 million marketing campaign which has had little effect on kbig
lines.name: English

lines.value: cfo pat walsh said it was the single largest marketing program in emmis history ceo jeff smulyan seemed unsure of kmvn saying rhythmic ac moving may or may not be right but after a shaky start in its first two arbitron books kmvn did move up in the spring 2007 period while kbig saw a dip
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite having been a rhythmic based radio station at the time kbig was a loyal affiliate to the legendary casey kasem and his weekly countdown show for hot ac stations american top 20 which ran sundays from 7:00am to 10:00am
lines.name: English

lines.value: former kbig morning man charlie tuna was kasem's regular substitute host
lines.name: English

lines.value: in february 2007 kbig added delilah back to its lineup
lines.name: English

lines.value: the news of having the program air on kbig generated a lot of talk because her show is geared toward a mainstream ac audience which was viewed as out of place on kbig with its rhythmic direction
lines.name: English

lines.value: however after adding delilah kbig began adding more mainstream ac product into the playlist
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the first week in september 2007 there was talk about kbig flipping formats and several domains had been registered
lines.name: English

lines.value: on september 17 charlie tuna confirmed a change was coming when he announced that he was out as morning host on his website but would continue to work within the clear channel/los angeles cluster
lines.name: English

lines.value: at 10 a.m on september 8 2007 immediately after tuna's show ended the station dropped rhythmic adult contemporary and began identifying itself as my fm adopting the adult top 40 format found on sister station kysr
lines.name: English

lines.value: kysr switched to alternative rock on september 20 2007
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first 2 songs on my fm were the plain white t's hey there delilah and bon jovi's living on a prayer
lines.name: English

lines.value: the rhythmic adult contemporary format heard on kbig moved to sister station khht
lines.name: English

lines.value: denes described kbig's new approach as contemporary adult hits in an interview with r&r clear channel la vp of programming michael martin said with today's consumer wanting to custom tailor everything to their liking the name my is a perfect brand for radio
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is a station designed by the listeners to play music they tell us they want to hear
lines.name: English

lines.value: how do we know what they want to hear
lines.name: English

lines.value: extensive market research and continual weekly music information to keep the station familiar fun and family friendly martin continued my is designed to sit right in the middle of star 98.7 kysr which has evolved to alternative and kost 103.5 playing a great mix of music styles and eras
lines.name: English

lines.value: the my playlist is deep filled with contemporary music from all genres
lines.name: English

lines.value: it's a mix that is not currently heard in la radio denes added in the same article 104.3 myfm will play adult hits like kelly clarkson beyonce christina aguilera fergie justin timberlake john mayer shakira madonna santana and much more
lines.name: English

lines.value: every song we play is or was at the top of the charts with the move delilah was once again dropped leaving los angeles without a delilah affiliate until 2012 when she was picked up by kfsh fm
lines.name: English

lines.value: sean valentine who had been at 102.7 kiis fm hosts the morning show along with jill escotto and kevin manno
lines.name: English

lines.value: kbig reintroduced american top 20 with casey kasem on sunday february 24 2008
lines.name: English

lines.value: the show aired in the same time slot it aired prior to the my flip sundays from 7 a.m to 10 a.m until casey retired from the program on july 5 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: also disco saturday night was carried by my fm for nearly a year after the format change
lines.name: English

lines.value: after labor day 2008 the show was replaced by 8 hours of 80s until spring of 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: in april 2009 sean hamilton long time afternoon host at wktu fm in new york joined my fm as host of its afternoon show 3 p.m to 7 p.m hamilton remained in new york and voicetracked his show for my fm
lines.name: English

lines.value: the current afternoon host is dave styles
lines.name: English

lines.value: dawson mcallister live was added on sunday evenings in july 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: my fm is one of the few hot ac stations to carry the show as it usually is found on chr stations and geared toward a teenage and young adult audience
lines.name: English

lines.value: on january 23 2006 kbig launched an hd2 subchannel called studio 104 which focused on disco hits
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station had been programmed by blake florence
lines.name: English

lines.value: on june 4 2008 at noon kbig's hd2 dropped the all disco format to introduce an lgbt oriented hd radio station called pride radio from iheart media
lines.name: English

lines.value: it plays dance and rhythmic hits
lines.name: English

lines.value: on february 8 1994 kbig was sued by singer barry manilow who sought $13 million in damages and $15 million in punitive damages claiming that one of their advertisements was causing irreparable damage to his professional reputation
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ad a 30-second spot which began airing on january 31 suggested that people listen to kbig because it does not play manilow's music
lines.name: English

lines.value: the lawsuit was filed in orange county superior court by los angeles attorney c tucker cheadle
lines.name: English

lines.value: two days later kbig/104.3 fm agreed to drop the commercial poking fun at the singer but a lawyer representing his business interests stopped short of agreeing to withdraw a $28 million lawsuit
lines.name: English

lines.value: bobby rydell born robert louis ridarelli april 26 1942 ) is an american professional singer mainly of rock and roll music
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the early 1960s he was considered a teen idol
lines.name: English

lines.value: his most well known songs include wild one and volare cover and he appeared in the movie bye bye birdie in 1963
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell was born in philadelphia pennsylvania united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1950 he won a talent show on the television series paul whiteman's tv teen club and gained a spot on the cast where he remained for several years
lines.name: English

lines.value: he changed his name to bobby rydell and played in several bands in the philadelphia area
lines.name: English

lines.value: after three unsuccessful singles for small companies he signed a recording contract with cameo records
lines.name: English

lines.value: after a couple of flops kissing time reached the charts in 1959
lines.name: English

lines.value: in may 1960 rydell toured australia with the everly brothers billy crash craddock marv johnson the champs and the crickets recording an australian version of kissing time for the event
lines.name: English

lines.value: his second success we got love was his first million album seller gaining gold disc status
lines.name: English

lines.value: his 1960's wild one backed with little bitty girl was his second million selling single his successes continued with swinging school backed with ding a ling and the million album selling volare later that year
lines.name: English

lines.value: he performed at the copacabana in new york in 1961 where he was the youngest performer to headline at the nightclub
lines.name: English

lines.value: in february 1961 he appeared at the festival du rock at the palais des sports de paris in paris france
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell's success and prospects led his father adrio a foreman at the electro nite carbon company in philadelphia to resign in 1961 after 22 years to become his son's road manager
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell released the song wildwood days in 1963
lines.name: English

lines.value: that year he played hugo peabody in the movie version of bye bye birdie with ann margret and dick van dyke
lines.name: English

lines.value: the original stage production of bye bye birdie had no real speaking role for the character of hugo but the movie script was rewritten specifically to expand the part for rydell
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2011 sony pictures digitally restored this film
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell and ann margret were in attendance at the restoration premiere in beverly hills by the academy of motion picture arts and sciences
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the 1960s rydell had numerous hit records on the billboard hot 100 record chart
lines.name: English

lines.value: his recording career earned him 34 top 40 hits placing him in the top 5 artists of his era billboard
lines.name: English

lines.value: these included his most popular successes wild one his highest scoring single at number 2 volare number 4 swinging school number 5 kissing time number 11 sway number 14 i've got bonnie number 18 and the cha cha cha number 10
lines.name: English

lines.value: his last major chart success was forget him which reached number 4 on the hot 100 in january 1964
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song written by tony hatch was his fifth and final gold disc winner
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell left cameo parkway records later in 1964 and signed with capitol records
lines.name: English

lines.value: during this time he performed on many television programs including the red skelton show where a recurring role was written for him by red skelton as zeke kadiddlehopper clem kadiddlehopper's younger cousin
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also appeared on the danny thomas show jack benny joey bishop and the george burns show
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell was a regular on the milton berle show
lines.name: English

lines.value: and was a panel member of to tell the truth in 1964
lines.name: English

lines.value: on october 6 1964 he made a guest appearance on the episode duel of the television series combat
lines.name: English

lines.value: this was rydell's first dramatic acting role
lines.name: English

lines.value: in january 1968 it was announced in the uk music magazine nme that rydell had signed a long term recording contract with reprise records company
lines.name: English

lines.value: he continued to perform in nightclubs supper clubs and las vegas venues throughout the 1970s and 1980s but his career was hampered by cameo parkway catalogue owner abkco records refusal to reissue rydell's music so the entire catalog was unavailable until 2005 although he rerecorded his hits in 1995 for k tel records
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell was married to his first wife camille quattrone ridarelli from 1968 until her death in 2003
lines.name: English

lines.value: he remarried in 2009 to linda hoffman
lines.name: English

lines.value: rydell continued to perform as a solo act and has toured as part of the golden boys stage production since 1985 with frankie avalon and fabian
lines.name: English

lines.value: however rydell cancelled his 2012 australia tour because his health had deteriorated significantly and he was in need of urgent major surgery
lines.name: English

lines.value: on july 9 2012 he underwent a double organ transplant to replace his liver and one kidney at thomas jefferson university in his hometown of philadelphia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in january 2013 six months after double transplant surgery rydell returned to the stage in las vegas for a three night engagement to a sold out audience
lines.name: English

lines.value: he continues to perform internationally and he returned to tour australia in 2014
lines.name: English

lines.value: in both the broadway musical drama grease and the film grease the high school was named rydell high after rydell
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2000 in the book the beatles anthology pg
lines.name: English

lines.value: 96 paul mccartney said john lennon and i wrote she loves you together
lines.name: English

lines.value: there was a bobby rydell song out at the time and as often happens you think of one song when you write another
lines.name: English

lines.value: we'd planned an answering song where a couple of us would sing she loves you and the other ones would answer yeah yeah we decided that was a crummy idea but at least we then had the idea of a song called she loves you so we sat in the hotel bedroom for a few hours and wrote it john and i sitting on twin beds with guitars no specific song title is given in the beatles anthology but bob spitz writes in the beatles the biography that mccartney originally modeled she loves you on the rydell answering song called swinging school and not forget him as is commonly cited
lines.name: English

lines.value: the eleventh edition of the south american championship was held in lima peru from october 30 to november 27 1927
lines.name: English

lines.value: the participating countries were argentina bolivia peru and uruguay
lines.name: English

lines.value: brazil chile and paraguay withdrew from the tournament
lines.name: English

lines.value: this was the first south american championship in which peru participated
lines.name: English

lines.value: the tournament was also used as a qualifier for the 1928 summer olympics and both argentina and uruguay were subsequently invited to enter that competition
lines.name: English

lines.value: for a complete list of participants squads see 1927 south american championship squads
lines.name: English

lines.name: English

lines.value: andrzej mokronowski 1713-1784 was a notable member of the polish szlachta a politician and general of the polish army
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was the first polish mason and founder of the first masonic lodge in poland opened in 1774 in warsaw
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was made a knight of the order of the white eagle in 1776 and served as marshal of the sejm from august 26 to october 31 1776 in warsaw
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was voivode of the masovian voivodeship from 1781
lines.name: English

lines.value: the near south side is a community area of chicago in cook county illinois united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is located just south of the downtown central business district the loop which is itself a community area
lines.name: English

lines.value: the near south side's boundaries see map are as follows north roosevelt road 1200 s south 26th street west chicago river between roosevelt and 18th street clark street between 18th street and cermak road federal between cermak road and the stevenson expressway just south of 25th street and clark street again between the stevenson and 26th street and east lake michigan
lines.name: English

lines.value: the portion of the near south side located near lake shore drive contains some of the most well known structures in chicago soldier field the home of the national football league chicago bears mccormick place chicago's primary convention center the museum campus which contains the field museum the shedd aquarium and the adler planetarium and northerly island
lines.name: English

lines.value: the remaining area is currently undergoing a major residential and mixed use redevelopment
lines.name: English

lines.value: as part of the chicago 2016 olympic bid the olympic village was planned to be located on a truck parking lot south of mccormick place that is mostly in the douglas community area and partly in the near south side
lines.name: English

lines.value: the near south side is one of the most dynamic of chicago's communities
lines.name: English

lines.value: it has undergone a metamorphosis from a native american homeland to a blue collar settlement to an elite socialite residential district to a center for vice to a slum to a public housing and warehouse district and finally to the home of a newly gentrified residential district
lines.name: English

lines.value: the near south side was initially noted for wagon trails winding through a lightly populated bend of lake michigan
lines.name: English

lines.value: this area was first populated by settlers working for the illinois & michigan canal who subsequently worked in the lumber district
lines.name: English

lines.value: proximity to the railroads attracted light manufacturing and shops
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1853 the community was absorbed by the extension of the city limits to 31st street in the same period the illinois central railroad was built into chicago
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1859 a south state street horse drawn streetcar line linking the area to downtown attracted wealthy families to the area
lines.name: English

lines.value: by the time of the great chicago fire in 1871 it was home to some of the city's finest mansions and most elite social families and in the 1890s the railroad's central station opened at 12th street
lines.name: English

lines.value: however by the start of the 20th century rapid transit evolved and many families moved slightly farther from the loop business district
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railroads brought warehouses and light manufacturing
lines.name: English

lines.value: michigan avenue between 14th street and 22nd street became an auto row
lines.name: English

lines.value: the levee vice district of brothels and gambling dens around cermak street and state street prospered until 1912
lines.name: English

lines.value: burnham park and several accompanying institutions were built in the 1910s and 1920s
lines.name: English

lines.value: world war i and post world war i great migration settlers moved in and created the low rent black belt
lines.name: English

lines.value: urban renewal and public housing projects later replaced some of the slums
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 1940s some of the city's slums were on the near south side
lines.name: English

lines.value: the century of progress international exposition was the name of the world's fair held on the near south side lakefront from 1933 to 1934 to celebrate the city's centennial
lines.name: English

lines.value: the theme of the fair was technological innovation over the century since chicago's founding
lines.name: English

lines.value: more than 40 million people visited the fair which symbolized for many hope for chicago and the nation then in the midst of the great depression
lines.name: English

lines.value: west of lake shore drive much of the near south side in the middle of the twentieth century consisted largely of railroad tracks and interchanges until the 1960s when middle class housing developments were built in the community area
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1977 george halas surrendered of railyards for redevelopment as dearborn park apartments townhouses and accompanying tree lined walkways
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1988 the second phase of dearborn park construction began between state st and clark st south of roosevelt rd a housing boom emerged in the 1990s and continues to the present day with the construction of many new condominium and apartment towers
lines.name: English

lines.value: construction of the central station development commenced in 1990
lines.name: English

lines.value: this was a mixed use development on of former rail yards and air rights east of indiana avenue between roosevelt road and 18th street
lines.name: English

lines.value: simultaneously loft conversion spread to the warehouses and light manufacturing structures along the major north south avenues of michigan indiana and wabash which returned them to residential properties 100 years after the flight of the elite chicago socialites
lines.name: English

lines.value: among the prominent buildings are one museum park and one museum park west along a redeveloped prairie avenue
lines.name: English

lines.value: landfill use created burnham park and northerly island in the 1920s and 1930s along lake michigan
lines.name: English

lines.value: the field museum of natural history soldier field adler planetarium and the john g shedd aquarium were constructed on this newly reclaimed land at this time
lines.name: English

lines.value: later merrill c meigs field airport was built
lines.name: English

lines.value: northerly island connects to the rest of the museum campus through a narrow isthmus along solidarity drive dominated by neoclassical sculptures of kosciuszko havlicek and nicolaus copernicus
lines.name: English

lines.value: adler planetarium rr donnelley and sons co calumet plant henry b clarke house coca cola company building on wabash field museum of natural history john j glessner house william w kimball house maxwell briscoe automobile company showroom quinn chapel ame church harriet f rees house reid house st luke's hospital complex second presbyterian church shedd aquarium soldier field and wheeler kohn house are all located in the community area and are all listed on the national register of historic places nrhp

lines.value: iklaina () is a historic village in the municipal unit of pylos messenia greece
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is situated in low hills approximately 10 km to the northeast of the town of pylos
lines.name: English

lines.value: important archaeological remains of the late bronze age ca 1600-1100 bc period have been brought to light through excavations and surface survey by the athens archaeological society and the university of missouri st louis under the direction of professor michael cosmopoulos
lines.name: English

lines.value: the finds include an early mycenaean palace giant terrace walls murals an advanced drainage system and a clay tablet from between 1450 and 1350 bc featuring an early example of linear b writing
lines.name: English

lines.value: other periods represented are the late classical and the byzantine
lines.name: English

lines.value: the systematic excavation at iklaina started in 2006 after a survey which had taken place in the five previous years.the archaeologists located residential buildings dating to the end of the mh/ beginning of lh period and to the lk i/ii period
lines.name: English

lines.value: the discovery of a large terrace 23 x 8 m built in the cyclopean building system using massive blocks of stone proved to be particularly important
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cyclopean terrace as it was called supported a large building of the megaron type with possibly two or even three storeys called the cyclopean terrace complex
lines.name: English

lines.value: although this building had been partly destroyed the excavations revealed some of its surviving parts and defined its architectural form it was a building complex consisting of three wings built around a central rectangular court
lines.name: English

lines.value: the movable finds prove that the last phase of that building was the lh iiia2 period i.e about 1330 bc during the 2009 excavation period over 2500 fragments of wall paintings came to light
lines.name: English

lines.value: a striking fragment is that depicting a ship with three human figures and dolphins as well as a procession consisting of female figures
lines.name: English

lines.value: this building complex on the cyclopean terrace was completely destroyed in lh iiia2 period and was never built again
lines.name: English

lines.value: new building activity was carried out in the northern part of the settlement where the so called megaron y was constructed
lines.name: English

lines.value: this appears to have at least 3 rooms and a porch
lines.name: English

lines.value: a hearth and storage rooms were found
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the buildings of the southern side parts of a particularly elaborate sewage system were also discovered
lines.name: English

lines.value: the most important discovery however took place in a dump next to the central sewer which contained burnt shards
lines.name: English

lines.value: there was discovered a fragment of a linear b tablet which was written on both sides
lines.name: English

lines.value: this tablet dates to the lhiib iiia1 period i.e around 1450-1400 bc which makes it the earlier mycenaean tablet of mainland greece
lines.name: English

lines.value: furthermore during the excavation period of 2012 an open air sanctuary was discovered also unique for that period and for mainland greece in general
lines.name: English

lines.value: another important find of the same excavation period was a large rectangular building building x in front of which passed a paved street of an exceptionally elaborate construction possibly a processional street which led the way from the houses of the settlement to the complex of the cyclopean terrace
lines.name: English

lines.value: on the basis of the available evidence it appears that iklaina was a powerful mycenaean centre in the lh iib/ iiia1 period
lines.name: English

lines.value: the large building complexes the rich finds the refined taste and the advanced level of technical knowledge of the inhabitants attest to the fact that iklaina could have been the capital of an autonomous small state which clashed with a neighbouring state at ano englianos the latter subdued the former and demoted it to a secondary capital of one of the provinces of pylia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the final destruction of the site seems to have occurred at about 1200 bc
lines.name: English

lines.value: nicholas d'virgilio born november 12 1968 often referred to as ndv is an american drummer and multi instrumentalist musician best known as a former member of the progressive rock band spock's beard
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was also one of two drummers chosen to replace phil collins in genesis on the calling all stations album
lines.name: English

lines.value: he has also done session work with many artists including tears for fears and mystery and is an official member of big big train
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio was the drummer in spock's beard since the band began in the early 1990s
lines.name: English

lines.value: after neal morse left in 2002 d'virgilio took over on lead vocals and became their frontman during live performances
lines.name: English

lines.value: in this line up spock's beard subsequently recorded four albums feel euphoria octane the self titled spock's beard and x prior to d'virgilio's departure in 2011
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1994 d'virgilio joined kevin gilbert's reformed band giraffe for a one off performance of the genesis piece the lamb lies down on broadway at progfest 94
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1995 he performed drums as part of gilbert's touring band thud which recorded a live album live at the troubadour released in 1999
lines.name: English

lines.value: after gilbert's death in 1996 d'virgilio was asked by gilbert's estate to complete his second solo album the shaming of the true based on the extant tapes and gilbert's notes
lines.name: English

lines.value: shaming was released posthumously in 2000 and has d'virgilio on many tracks contributing drums percussion bass guitar keyboards and backing vocals
lines.name: English

lines.value: in november 2002 d'virgilio headlined progwest in claremont california and played the entire the shaming of the true album live in a band consisting of other friends and colleagues of gilbert's
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2008 video tapes of the troubadour concert were uncovered for the first time leading to a dvd entitled welcome to joytown - thud live at the troubadour released in 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: a lifelong fan of the progressive rock band genesis d'virgilio was given an opportunity by the band to replace phil collins on drums for their 1997 album calling all stations
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio split percussion duties with nir zidkyahu during work on the album
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio had been a full member of the mike keneally band from 2001 to 2004 playing on the tour supporting keneally's 2000 album dancing and later providing drums and vocals on the 2004 album dog as can be seen on the dvd included as part of the dog special edition in both live as well as making of studio footage
lines.name: English

lines.value: previous keneally drummer joe travers took d'virgilio's place in the band for the subsequent guitar therapy tour
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio's first solo album karma was recorded in 2001 at kevin gilbert's former studio lawnmower and garden supplies studio in pasadena
lines.name: English

lines.value: the album included performances by mike keneally and bryan beller d'virgilio's bandmates in the mike keneally band
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio also served as the chief engineer on beller's solo album view recorded at the same studio as karma
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio filled in for mark zonder on fates warning's summer tour with dream theater and queensryche in 2003
lines.name: English

lines.value: zonder's prior commitments prevented him from taking part in the tour and he ceased performing with the band following its 2005 release fwx due to a reported aversion to touring
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio played with the band on a handful of gigs supporting that album and appeared on the 2006 dvd release live in athens
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio also appeared on jordan rudess 2007 album the road home
lines.name: English

lines.value: after guesting on three tracks on big big train's 2007 album the difference machine he was billed as a permanent guest on the underfall yard 2009 and subsequently joined the band as a full member appearing on the 2010 ep far skies deep time english electric part one 2012 english electric part two 2013 the wassail ep 2015 and most recently folklore 2016 grimspound 2017 and the second brightest star 2017
lines.name: English

lines.value: on july 26 2011 d'virgilio released a solo ep called pieces
lines.name: English

lines.value: he performed a show in quebec city canada performing the ep in its entirety with local musicians on the day of the album release
lines.name: English

lines.value: on november 18 2011 d'virgilio announced that he had left spock's beard because of his work with cirque du soleil it is very hard for me to write this but as all good things come to an end at sometime or another unfortunately i have to tell you all that my time with spock's beard has come to a close in early 2014 d'virgilio appeared on strattman's album the lie of the beholder stating recording the drums for roy's record was a total blast
lines.name: English

lines.value: i am really honored that he asked me to be a part of his new musical adventure
lines.name: English

lines.value: the record rocks and from a drummer's perspective i got to hit em hard and got challenged by the songs - 2 things drummers love
lines.name: English

lines.value: i really enjoyed the whole process and the music in july 2016 d'virgilio and neal morse joined spock's beard for the only two performances of the album snow first at morsefest on july 2 and then for night of the prog in loreley germany on july 15.in august 2016 rock trio the fringe released its self titled debut album featuring d'virgilio on drums and vocals jonas reingold of the flower kings on bass and randy mcstine lo-fi resistance on vocals and guitars
lines.name: English

lines.value: d'virgilio lives in fort wayne indiana with his wife tiffany and his two children anthony and sophia
lines.name: English

lines.value: gustav heinrich theodor eimer 22 february 1843 - 29 may 1898 was a german zoologist
lines.name: English

lines.value: eimer was born in stafa
lines.name: English

lines.value: after spending his junior faculty years as prosector at julius maximillian's university in wurzburg he became in 1875 a professor of zoology and comparative anatomy at the university of tubingen
lines.name: English

lines.value: he is credited with popularizing the term orthogenesis originally introduced by wilhelm haacke in 1893 to describe evolution directed in specific pathways due to restrictions in the direction of variation
lines.name: English

lines.value: though his theories gained popularity in germany in the 1880s his work was not widely known in the english speaking world until 1890 when his work die entstehung der arten auf grund von vererben erworbener eigenschaften nach den gesetzen organischen waschsens(1888 was translated by joseph thomas cunningham as organic evolution as the result of the inheritance of acquired characters according to the laws of organic growth
lines.name: English

lines.value: this book was predominantly a neo lamarckian polemic against august weismann his compatriot neo darwinian
lines.name: English

lines.value: eimer's later work translated as on orthogenesis was a more rigidly orthogenetic text whereas organic evolution maintained a plurality of mechanisms for species formation
lines.name: English

lines.value: the eimer's organs found in members of the mole family especially in the star nosed mole are named after him
lines.name: English

lines.value: he described these organs in the european mole in 1871
lines.name: English

lines.value: eimeria a genus of parasitic protozoa was also named after him
lines.name: English

lines.value: maria linden became a precocious female student of eimer's
lines.name: English

lines.value: under eimer's guidance she was awarded a degree and in 1895 she completed her thesis on the evolution of a snail's shell and she was awarded a doctorate in natural science
lines.name: English

lines.value: she worked as an assistant to eimer until 1899
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also studied the systematics of papilionidae.eimer g h t die artbildung und verwandschaft bei den schmetterlingen
lines.name: English

lines.value: eine systematische darstellung der abanderungen abarten und arten der segelfalter-ahnlichen formen der gattung papilio
lines.name: English

lines.value: xii + 243 pp 4 pls 23 figs gustav fischer jena 1889 was published posthoumously from 1889
lines.name: English

lines.value: eimer died in tubingen
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth hepialus humuli also known as the ghost swift is a moth of the family hepialidae
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is common throughout europe except for in the far south east
lines.name: English

lines.value: female ghost moths are larger than males and exhibit sexual dimorphism with their differences in size and wing color
lines.name: English

lines.value: the adults fly from june to august and are attracted to light
lines.name: English

lines.value: the species overwinters as a larva
lines.name: English

lines.value: the term ghost moth is sometimes used as a general term for all hepialids
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth gets its name from the hovering display flight of the male sometimes slowly rising and falling over open ground to attract females
lines.name: English

lines.value: in a suitable location several males may display together in a lek
lines.name: English

lines.value: the larva is whitish and maggot like and feeds underground on the roots of a variety of wild and cultivated plants see list below
lines.name: English

lines.value: the species can be an economically significant pest in forest nurseries
lines.name: English

lines.value: female ghost moths have a wingspan of 50-70mm
lines.name: English

lines.value: they have yellowish buff forewing s with darker linear markings and brown hindwings
lines.name: English

lines.value: males are smaller with a wingspan of 46-50mm and typically have white or silver wings
lines.name: English

lines.value: however in h
lines.name: English

lines.value: h thulensis found in shetland and the faroe islands there are buff coloured individuals
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost swift aggregates in leks in order to attract female mates
lines.name: English

lines.value: lekking occurs at dusk and typically lasts for 20 30 minutes
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the lekking period incident light intensities between 10.0 and 2.0 lux have been found to increase the brightness contrast between the background grass plants and male moths silver white wings
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is thus believed that the male wing color may have evolved as a secondary adaptation to aid in the moth's visibility
lines.name: English

lines.value: the male ghost swifts display by hovering directly above vegetation while occasionally shifting slowly horizontally
lines.name: English

lines.value: the displaying male only occasionally made vertical movements to shift display positions
lines.name: English

lines.value: females are attracted to the displaying males in leks and once a female chooses a male she will pass within a few centimeters of him
lines.name: English

lines.value: the male will follow the female who will land and beat her wings signaling that the male may approach her
lines.name: English

lines.value: the two moths will then copulate and the male moth may return to the lek and display again afterwards
lines.name: English

lines.value: males perform a flight display and use both chemical and visual signals to attract females to their mating sites
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition to aggregating in leks male ghost swifts also use pheromones to attract a mate
lines.name: English

lines.value: the pheromones are emitted in order to attract a female but they are not used as an aphrodisiac
lines.name: English

lines.value: the main component of the male pheromone is e,e)-a-famesene
lines.name: English

lines.value: the olfactory substances used to attract females are produced on the male's hind tibial brushes
lines.name: English

lines.value: males may also be attracted to stationary females by olfactory stimuli
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition the male ghost moths produce a goat like smell from their hind tibiae while in flight
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth displays high levels of sexual dichromatism see picture below
lines.name: English

lines.value: female ghost moths are a yellow brownish color while males have silver white wings
lines.name: English

lines.value: it has been suggested that the difference in wing color between males and females is used for visual epidemic signaling
lines.name: English

lines.value: the upper side of males have unpigmented scales with elaborate morphology and meshwork that allow for light reflection and may aid in attracting females
lines.name: English

lines.value: the females lack the intricate morphology of the males
lines.name: English

lines.value: the underside of both the male and female ghost moth is a uniform grey brown color
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is believed that there is behavioral dimorphism as well with one study showing that females were more attracted to light than males
lines.name: English

lines.value: common predators of ghost moths include several species of bats and birds
lines.name: English

lines.value: these predators are attracted to the moths during the male flight displays
lines.name: English

lines.value: eptesicus nilssonii the northern bat has often been documented preying on lekking ghost moths
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth is a member of the family hepialidae an early branch of lepidoptera
lines.name: English

lines.value: species in the hepialidae lack several predator defense systems including ultrasonic hearing
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth lacks sophisticated predator defense systems and instead the ghost moth restricts its sexual behavior to a short period during dusk to reduce its predation risk
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite these precautions the moth is still at a large predation risk
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is believed that the deaf moths such as the family hepialidae predate the predatory bats that may have driven the evolution of ultrasonic hearing
lines.name: English

lines.value: members of the hepialidae also lack adaptations that allow for erratic and maneuverable flight as well as color mimicking two traits that aid in predator defense
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is currently believed that the ghost moth's restricted flight patterns and low flight positions may be the ghost swift's main form of predatory defense
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth displays for only 20 30 minutes at dusk which aids in predator avoidance as most bats typically do not start feeding until after dusk when it is darker outside
lines.name: English

lines.value: on average most female ghost moths will lay around 600 eggs over four days but a female can lay anywhere from 200 to 1600 eggs
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth larvae grow up to 50mm long and have a white opaque body with a red brown head
lines.name: English

lines.value: their prothoracic plate is also red brown and their pinacula is dark brown
lines.name: English

lines.value: the young larvae feed on plant rootlets while the older large feed on larger roots stolons and the lower regions of plant stems
lines.name: English

lines.value: the larval growth is very slow and the developmental period can last for two to three years
lines.name: English

lines.value: the larva have at least 12 instars but further research is needed to see if there may be more instars during higher temperatures
lines.name: English

lines.value: the larva cause damage to the plants they consume with damage being the worst during the second summer of the larva's growth period
lines.name: English

lines.value: the larvae typically feed in grasslands lawns and pastures and have been known to cause significant damage to the host species
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the british isles the ghost moth larvae live in the soil and can commonly be found underneath the grass
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ghost moth typically pupates during the april or may after the two to three year larval growth period has ended
lines.name: English

lines.value: adults are most commonly found in june and july and they are typically active around dusk
lines.name: English

lines.value: in particular lekking and mating occurs at dusk
lines.name: English

lines.value: ghost moth larvae are polyphagous they are able to feed on multiple types of plants
lines.name: English

lines.value: larvae born on crops will typically feed on the roots and can cause significant damage to the crops
lines.name: English

lines.value: ghost moths frequently cause damage to strawberries lettuce and chrysanthemum plants
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is believed that the common name of ghost moth for hepialus humuli may have originated from european folklore as there are numerous references to white moths being the souls of the departed
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is believed that the ghost moth is also referenced in the last passage of wuthering heights by emily bronte
lines.name: English

lines.value: chinese authors retain a number of species in hepialus
lines.name: English

lines.value: most of these are placed in the genus thitarodes by others
lines.name: English

lines.value: species retained in hepialus include
lines.name: English
